meanings.definition: A subatomic particle that is the antiparticle of a baryon.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study antibaryons to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The collision of baryons and antibaryons can result in annihilation.
meanings.sent3: At the particle party, the antibaryons refused to dance with the baryons.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between baryons and antibaryons is like matter meeting antimatter.
meanings.sent5: In the world of subatomic particles, antibaryons are the mirror image of baryons.

meanings.definition: Particles that are composed of three antiquarks.
meanings.sent1: Antibaryons are made up of three antiquarks, unlike baryons.
meanings.sent2: The collision of antiquarks can sometimes produce antibaryons.
meanings.sent3: The antiquarks threw a surprise party for the antibaryons.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of particle physics, antibaryons stand out with their unique composition.
meanings.sent5: The three antiquarks in antibaryons form a stable structure in the subatomic world.
